name: Ataraxia (Exion)
description:
Disclaimer: This game was made for the Cosmic Horrors Jam as a solo dev. Game was a bit rushed around the end as I had no time to finish it.

Play as an Eldritch God and conquer the city by using your powerful cards to warp those mortals' minds.

How to Play?
  • The game cycle through night and day:
    • During the day, select your cards, then a target.
    • During the night, you get your first contact's cards, you can use one to shift the game in your favor.
    • At the end of the night, Suspicion is removed, a good rest makes your worries go away after all.
  • Your goal is to corrupt all citizen in the city. To do so, you'll need to bring down their Mental Strength down to 0 or make them fully Insane.
  • Making someone Insane has a cost, though. After all, someone sane going crazy overnight is a bit weird. When someone goes Insane, all their friends will generate 3 suspicion points.
  • Beware, for the crusade is guarding this city. If your suspicion goes too high, a crusader might pop up there to find and kill the corrupted.
Game is not finished

As I mentioned in the Disclaimer, this game hasn't been finished. I am a sole student and worked on the jam during my free time (when I had such).

Lots of the graphics are just placeholder. As of now, only The Ruthless has a basic deck made.
